Book your space


An open source application for managing office desk booking






Nov 23, 2022

title: Book your space
text:
demo  source code


Motivation
The COVID-19 pandemic breakout has led to a significant shift in the way we work, with many employees now working remotely or in a hybrid model. This has created a need for new tools and technologies to help businesses manage their office space more effectively.
This application for managing desk office booking is designed to address this challenge.


How it works
Build on Google apps script platform, the application is designed to work in a Google enviroment.
It allows:

Person quota managing over 2 weeks of booking
Display names customization
Bookings download

Fork the script here and adapt it on your needs.

Welcome here,
I’m a Statistician with a degree in actuarial science. My final dissertation was on “Statistical methods for pair-trading strategies: a state-space models approach”.  I’m passionate about unconvering hidden patterns and extracting actionable insights from complex data.   Ad Hoc RPA Analyst, passionate about processes optimization.   Check out some of my projects.
